unittitle_ssm: Walking Race: Heel and Toe Artists Hoof it to Coney Island and two other films
abstract_ssm: This collection contains a 16 mm film containing three segments, circa 1930.  The first segment shows a foot race from New York City Hall to Coney Island, the second shows a wedding of three brothers of the Sultan of Morocco, and the third shows showgirls auditioning for the stage. The film is silent, black-and-white, and runs five minutes and thirty seconds. It was produced by Major Tom Evans and edited by A.F. Bernadac.
